name: DashDice Progress Sync
description: Automatically syncs your Geometry Dash level progress to DashDice.

server-url.name: Sync Endpoint
server-url.description: URL to POST progress to (for example, http://localhost:3000/api/sync/progress).

api-key.name: API Key
api-key.description: Bearer API key generated by your web dashboard.

request-timeout.name: Request Timeout (s)
request-timeout.description: HTTP timeout in seconds for sync requests.
